statements: SELECT * FROM waste_decay_rates
SELECT waste_type, decay_rate FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE landfill_location = 'Landfill A'
SELECT * FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE measurement_unit = 'kilograms'
SELECT waste_type, decay_rate FROM waste_decay_rates ORDER BY waste_type DESC
SELECT * FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE decay_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE landfill_location = 'Landfill A' ORDER BY decay_rate DESC;
SELECT waste_type, decay_rate, landfill_location FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE measurement_unit = 'kg' ORDER BY waste_type ASC, decay_rate DESC;
SELECT landfill_location, AVG(decay_rate) AS avg_decay_rate FROM waste_decay_rates GROUP BY landfill_location HAVING AVG(decay_rate) > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE decay_rate BETWEEN 1.5 AND 3.5 ORDER BY waste_type;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT waste_type) AS total_waste_types FROM waste_decay_rates WHERE measurement_unit = 'lbs';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates;
SELECT waste_type, decay_rate FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates WHERE landfill_id = 1;
SELECT landfill_id, measurement_date, decay_rate FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM landfill_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT landfill_name, address FROM landfill_locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY landfill_name;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates WHERE landfill_id = 1
SELECT landfill_name, city, state, country FROM landfill_locations WHERE state = 'California'
SELECT waste_type, measurement_date FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates WHERE decay_rate > 3.5
SELECT landfill_name, address FROM landfill_locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA'
SELECT MAX(decay_rate) AS max_decay_rate, MIN(decay_rate) AS min_decay_rate FROM biodegradable_waste_decay_rates
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDecayRates;
SELECT waste_type, decay_rate FROM BiodegradableWasteDecayRates WHERE decay_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM LandfillLocations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM LandfillLocations WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT strategy_name, recommended_actions FROM WasteDisposalStrategies WHERE LENGTH(recommended_actions) > 100;
SELECT * FROM BiodegradableWasteDecayRates WHERE decay_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY waste_id DESC;
SELECT waste_type, landfill_location FROM BiodegradableWasteDecayRates WHERE waste_type = 'Organic' ORDER BY waste_id ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, recommended_actions FROM WasteDisposalStrategies WHERE strategy_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM LandfillLocations WHERE latitude < 0 OR longitude > 0;
SELECT waste_id, decay_rate FROM BiodegradableWasteDecayRates WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY decay_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM decay_rates;
SELECT id, waste_type FROM decay_rates WHERE decay_rate > 0.5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM landfill_location ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT waste_type, amount_kg, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE amount_kg >= 100 ORDER BY collection_date;

SELECT waste_tracking.id, waste_tracking.start_date, waste_tracking.end_date, landfill_location.location_name FROM waste_tracking JOIN landfill_location ON waste_tracking.landfill_id = landfill_location.id;
SELECT * FROM decay_rates ORDER BY decay_rate DESC, waste_type ASC;
SELECT id, location_name FROM landfill_location WHERE longitude <= -80.123456;
SELECT waste_id, start_date, end_date FROM waste_tracking WHERE landfill_id = 5 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, waste_type, amount_kg, collection_date FROM waste_collection WHERE amount_kg > 1000;

SELECT w.id, w.waste_type, l.location_name FROM decay_rates w JOIN waste_tracking t ON w.id = t.waste_id JOIN landfill_location l ON t.landfill_id = l.id WHERE l.latitude >= 40.7128 AND t.end_date IS NULL ORDER BY l.longitude ASC;
SELECT id, waste_name, decay_rate FROM WasteType WHERE id = 1
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM LandfillSite WHERE id = 3
SELECT waste_id, landfill_id, measurement_date, waste_weight FROM WasteMeasurement ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT report_date, landfill_id, efficiency_rating FROM EvaluationReport WHERE efficiency_rating > 80
SELECT name, specialization FROM Researcher
SELECT * FROM WasteType WHERE waste_name = 'Plastic' AND decay_rate >= 0.5
SELECT site_name, location FROM LandfillSite ORDER BY location ASC, site_name DESC
SELECT w.id, w.waste_name, l.capacity FROM WasteType w INNER JOIN LandfillSite l ON w.id = l.id WHERE l.capacity > 1000
SELECT r.name, r.specialization, e.efficiency_rating FROM Researcher r LEFT JOIN EvaluationReport e ON r.id = e.landfill_id
SELECT m.measurement_date, m.waste_weight, w.waste_name FROM WasteMeasurement m INNER JOIN WasteType w ON m.waste_id = w.id ORDER BY m.measurement_date DESC
